Shahid Beheshti University: Shahid Beheshti University (SBU) (Persian: دانشگاه شهید بهشتی, romanized: Dāneshgāh-e Shahid Beheshti), originally founded as the Melli University (National University of Iran) (Persian: دانشگاه ملی, romanized: Dāneshgāh-e Melli), is a public research university in Tehran, Iran. The university offers many programs at Bachelor's, Master's and Ph.D. levels.
